description: A schema which validates params accepted by the Pubmatic adapter
title: Pubmatic Adapter Params

___adSlot.description: An ID which identifies the ad slot

___publisherId.description: An ID which identifies the publisher

items.description: A key with one or more values associated with it. These are used in buy-side segment targeting.

___wrapper.description: Specifies pubmatic openwrap configuration for a publisher

___version.description: An ID which identifies version of the openwrap profile

___profile.description: An ID which identifies the openwrap profile of publisher
